author: gregthegreek
content: this is what i was trying to explain earlier, as web3 api (web3.js) we have to make a lot of weird assumptions. I think at this point we maintain everything that we have currently, `web3.eth.___` (execution), but then we need to drop the base level `web3.___` since `web3.getBlock` and `web3.eth.getBlock` are potentially misleading

author: gregthegreek
content: I will strongly oppose requiring a renaming of `web3.eth`, for example, because this will break every application.

author: gregthegreek
content: Current devtooling must maintain its current form and be synonymous with anything `execution`
